content.description: Stem and work the crack, protecting with a full range of gear mostly fingers to fists, but also a short off-width section near the top.  Save a few cams BD 0.1-0.4 to build an anchor in the crack for Vascular Massacre above the belay ledge, and bring up your second.
content.protection: Rap from webbing on a large tree at far corner of climber's-left side of ledge, roughly 35' from route.
content.location: Hike around the wall right of Baptist Preacher to a pair of cracks under a large roof.  This is the left of the two cracks.

content.description: Mostly easy climbing with key stances for placing gear when you need them.  A single rack 0.1-#4 will get you up, saving the BD 0.1-0.3 or nuts for building an anchor to bring up your second.
content.protection: Scramble up the ledge after completing the climb to a large tree on a point to climber's right to rap from slings.
content.location: Hike around the wall right of Baptist Preacher to a pair of dihedrals under a large roof.  This the right of the two routes.

content.description: Awesome off-width climbing, featured but slopey. Has 2 roofs, one at 8 feet and the other at 50ft. Optional belay at the 2nd roof, can be skipped if you pay attention to the rope drag. Top it out and walk 300 feet right to a rap tree above Blue Thunder.
content.protection: Standard rack for the Red up to 5 inches,you wont need a lot of tiny gear. A good idea to have some doubles of your larger pieces to throw in.
